pullRequest.title: [DOC] Accessibility improvements to Using Strimzi guide
pullRequest.bodyText:
Type of change

Documentation

Description
Guide(s) updated:

Using Strimzi

Make several changes to improve the accessibility of the Strimzi documentation based on common best practices, e.g. Section 508. These changes can help users of screen readers to access the documentation more easily.
Summary of changes:

Add more descriptive alt-text to some images / graphics
Add captions to several tables. In Asciidoc, these table captions will render as figures (figure 1, figure 2).
Split the Cluster CA Secrets table into five separate tables. Complex tables with merged headers can be difficult for screen readers to interpret.

Checklist
Please go through this checklist and make sure all applicable tasks have been done

 Write tests
 Make sure all tests pass
 Update documentation
 Check RBAC rights for Kubernetes / OpenShift roles
 Try your changes from Pod inside your Kubernetes and OpenShift cluster, not just locally
 Reference relevant issue(s) and close them after merging - NO ISSUES FOUND
 Update CHANGELOG.md
 Supply screenshots for visual changes, such as Grafana dashboards
